channel.title: Axoloti bass patch
channel.description: Sound snippet of a patch I've created recently [https://youtu.be/7tPy98IDnyA](https://youtu.be/7tPy98IDnyA) I've used Bass Station as keyboard controller only (works like a charm via USB :thumbsup: ) with the appregiator enabled. I've tried to map the knobs to parameters in the patch but silly me, I've came across wrong midi implementation chart - obviously modwheel and cutoff knob send's NRPN not CC values. I'm hopping to reassign the parameters to CC sending knobs or upgrade the enclosure with knobs for future use. Really like the sound :heart_eyes: trice.axp (30.1 KB)

I've used Bass Station as keyboard controller only (works like a charm via USB ) with the appregiator enabled. I've tried to map the knobs to parameters in the patch but silly me, I've came across wrong midi implementation chart - obviously modwheel and cutoff knob send's NRPN not CC values. I'm hopping to reassign the parameters to CC sending knobs or upgrade the enclosure with knobs for future use. Really like the sound
